Actions.Name: Dancing Flames
Actions.Description: The [name] deals 2 damage to a character in range, then deals 2 damage to all marked foes.

Actions.Name: Ignition
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range. At the start of that foe's turn, or when the Jotunn hits the target with an attack, they explode for a small blast area effect centered on them, dealing 2 damage to all characters within.
